data.eml:eml: Elephantis, a new genus for Caridina natalensis Bouvier, 1925 from eastern rivers of Madagascar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castelin, Magalie, Marquet, Gerard, Klotz, Werner (2013): Elephantis, a new genus for Caridina natalensis Bouvier, 1925 from eastern rivers of Madagascar. Zootaxa 3702 (6): 573-586, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3702.6.5
